query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_class_enrollments (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  classId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  enrolledAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_student_class (studentId, classId),
  INDEX idx_student (studentId),
  INDEX idx_class (classId),
  INDEX idx_user (userId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_attendance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  classId INT NOT NULL,
  scheduleId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('present', 'absent', 'justified') NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_student_schedule (studentId, scheduleId, date),
  INDEX idx_student_date (studentId, date),
  INDEX idx_class_date (classId, date),
  INDEX idx_user (userId)
);

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS student_attendance (
  id INT AUTO_INCREMENT PRIMARY KEY,
  studentId INT NOT NULL,
  classId INT NOT NULL,
  scheduleId INT NOT NULL,
  userId INT NOT NULL,
  date VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
  status ENUM('present', 'absent', 'justified') NOT NULL,
  notes TEXT,
  createdAt TIMESTAMP DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  UNIQUE KEY unique_student_schedule (studentId, scheduleId, date),
  INDEX idx_student_date (studentId, date),
  INDEX idx_class_date (classId, date),
  INDEX idx_user (userId)
);
